name: Verify user should able to view cancellation letter in documents tab when transaction date is greater than system date for cancellation transaction

testSteps.description: 1: Verify user should able to view cancellation letter in documents tab when transaction date is greater than system date for cancellation transaction ({cancellationtype=Flat, cancellationreason=Duplicate coverage})

children.description: Given Underwriter has ability to create Policy for LOB Workers Compensation
When Underwriter creates WK policy
Then Policy created successfully
Given user has a WK Policy
And Cancellation is performed on policy for transaction effective date 06/19/2022
And with cancellation type Flat and cancellation reason Duplicate coverage
When user searches for the documents in documents tab
Then Cancellation documents/letter should be displayed correctly
And the same needs to be updated in Billing system

testSteps.description: 2: Verify user should able to view cancellation letter in documents tab when transaction date is greater than system date for cancellation transaction ({cancellationtype=short, cancellationreason=Coverage Placed With Another Carrier})

children.description: Given Underwriter has ability to create Policy for LOB Workers Compensation
When Underwriter creates WK policy
Then Policy created successfully
Given user has a WK Policy
And Cancellation is performed on policy for transaction effective date 06/19/2022
And with cancellation type short and cancellation reason Coverage Placed With Another Carrier
When user searches for the documents in documents tab
Then Cancellation documents/letter should be displayed correctly
And the same needs to be updated in Billing system

testSteps.description: 3: Verify user should able to view cancellation letter in documents tab when transaction date is greater than system date for cancellation transaction ({cancellationtype=Pro rata, cancellationreason=Completed Operations})

dataTable.scenarioOutline:
Given user has a WK Policy
And Cancellation is performed on policy for transaction effective date 06/19/2022
And with cancellation type <cancellationtype> and cancellation reason <cancellationreason>
When user searches for the documents in documents tab
Then Cancellation documents/letter should be displayed correctly
And the same needs to be updated in Billing system
